issue.title: door valve and hinge friction range

content.raw: The friction range for the antenna controls was 1.0 - 4.0 if I recall correctly.  So the airlock valve is on the low side of that?  I'll try turning it again today, but yesterday it didn't want to turn with the same maneuver that turns the antenna controls.
content.html: The friction range for the antenna controls was 1.0 - 4.0 if I recall correctly. So the airlock valve is on the low side of that? I'll try turning it again today, but yesterday it didn't want to turn with the same maneuver that turns the antenna controls.
